name: Pawn (itch) (U23)
description:
The objective of the game is to take down the bot pawns in a limited amount of moves. If a bot pawn witnesses a dead body or you stained in blood, your limited amount of moves will be deducted drastically, although, murdering a witness does help increase your steps. Good luck.

I recommend downloading Pawn_Polished.zip for a maximized experience.

Stuff:

'WASD' or arrow keys to move

'.' to cremate a body

Stand beside a pawn to kill

Head near water to wash yourself

Kill all the other pawns to win. Good luck.
